phrases.pt: Acho que isso faz sentido para mim.
phrases.ru: Думаю, в этом есть смысл для меня.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈaʃu kɨ ˈisu faʃ sẽˈtĩdu ˈpaɾɐ mĩ

translations.text: I think that makes sense to me.

phrases.pt: Não tenho a certeza se concordo totalmente.
phrases.ru: Я не уверен(а), что полностью с этим согласен(на).
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu ɐ sɨɾˈtezɐ sɨ kõˈkɔɾɡu totɐɫˈmẽtɨ

translations.text: I’m not sure I completely agree.

phrases.pt: Isso não me parece uma boa ideia.
phrases.ru: Это не кажется мне хорошей идеей.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu nɐ̃w mɨ pɐˈɾesɨ ˈumɐ ˈboɐ iˈdɛjɐ

translations.text: That doesn’t seem like a good idea to me.

phrases.pt: Prefiro pensar nisso com mais calma.
phrases.ru: Я предпочитаю обдумать это спокойнее.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈfiɾu pẽˈsaɾ ˈnisu kõ ˈmajʃ ˈkaɫmɐ

translations.text: I prefer to think about it more calmly.

phrases.pt: Isso depende muito da situação.
phrases.ru: Это сильно зависит от ситуации.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu dɨˈpẽdɨ ˈmũjtu dɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w

translations.text: That depends a lot on the situation.

phrases.pt: Não estava à espera dessa resposta.
phrases.ru: Я не ожидал(а) такого ответа.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ɨʃˈtaβɐ a ʃpɨˈɾɛsɐ ˈdesɐ ʁɨʃˈpɔʃtɐ

translations.text: I wasn’t expecting that answer.

phrases.pt: Isso faz mais sentido agora.
phrases.ru: Теперь это имеет больше смысла.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu faʃ ˈmajʃ sẽˈtĩdu ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: That makes more sense now.

phrases.pt: Não me sinto confortável com isso.
phrases.ru: Мне с этим некомфортно.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w mɨ ˈsĩtu kõfuɾˈtaβɛɫ kõ ˈisu

translations.text: I don’t feel comfortable with that.

phrases.pt: Talvez seja melhor deixar assim.
phrases.ru: Возможно, лучше оставить всё как есть.
phrases.ipa_transcription: tɐɫˈveʃ ˈseʒɐ mɨˈʎɔɾ dɨjˈʃaɾ ɐˈsĩ

translations.text: Maybe it’s better to leave it like this.

phrases.pt: Preciso de pensar melhor nisso.
phrases.ru: Мне нужно лучше это обдумать.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ pẽˈsaɾ mɨˈʎɔɾ ˈnisu

translations.text: I need to think about this better.

phrases.pt: Para ser honesto, não esperava isso.
phrases.ru: Если честно, я этого не ожидал(а).
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈpaɾɐ seɾ uˈnɛʃtu nɐ̃w ʃpɨˈɾaβɐ ˈisu

translations.text: To be honest, I wasn’t expecting that.

phrases.pt: Vejo a situação de outra forma.
phrases.ru: Я вижу эту ситуацию по-другому.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈveʒu ɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w dɨ ˈotɾɐ ˈfɔɾmɐ

translations.text: I see the situation differently.

phrases.pt: Isso muda um pouco as coisas.
phrases.ru: Это немного меняет ситуацию.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ˈmudɐ ˈũ ˈpoku ɐʃ ˈkojzɐʃ

translations.text: That changes things a bit.

phrases.pt: Não é exatamente o que eu pensei.
phrases.ru: Это не совсем то, что я думал(а).
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ɛ izɐtɐˈmẽtɨ u kɨ ew pẽˈsaj

translations.text: That’s not exactly what I thought.

phrases.pt: Faz sentido do teu ponto de vista.
phrases.ru: Это имеет смысл с твоей точки зрения.
phrases.ipa_transcription: faʃ sẽˈtĩdu du ˈtew ˈpõtu dɨ ˈviʃtɐ

translations.text: That makes sense from your point of view.

phrases.pt: Não tenho uma resposta neste momento.
phrases.ru: У меня сейчас нет ответа.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu ˈumɐ ʁɨʃˈpɔʃtɐ ˈneʃtɨ muˈmẽtu

translations.text: I don’t have an answer at the moment.

phrases.pt: Talvez possamos falar disso depois.
phrases.ru: Возможно, мы сможем обсудить это позже.
phrases.ipa_transcription: tɐɫˈveʃ puˈsɐmuʃ fɐˈlaɾ ˈdisu dɨˈpojʃ

translations.text: Maybe we can talk about this later.

phrases.pt: Isso não corresponde ao que eu esperava.
phrases.ru: Это не соответствует тому, чего я ожидал(а).
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu nɐ̃w kõʁɨʃˈpõdɨ aw kɨ ew ʃpɨˈɾaβɐ

translations.text: That doesn’t match what I was expecting.

phrases.pt: Para mim, isso não é assim tão simples.
phrases.ru: Для меня это не так уж просто.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈpaɾɐ mĩ ˈisu nɐ̃w ɛ ɐˈsĩ tɐ̃w ˈsĩplɨʃ

translations.text: For me, it’s not that simple.

phrases.pt: Nunca tinha pensado nisso dessa maneira.
phrases.ru: Я никогда не думал(а) об этом таким образом.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈnũkɐ ˈtiɲɐ pẽˈsadu ˈnisu ˈdesɐ mɐnɐjˈɾɐ

translations.text: I had never thought about it that way.

phrases.pt: Isso levanta algumas dúvidas para mim.
phrases.ru: Это вызывает у меня некоторые сомнения.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu lɨˈvɐ̃tɐ ˈaɫɡumɐʃ ˈduβidɐʃ ˈpaɾɐ mĩ

translations.text: That raises some doubts for me.

phrases.pt: Não me parece a melhor solução.
phrases.ru: Это не кажется мне лучшим решением.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w mɨ pɐˈɾesɨ ɐ mɨˈʎɔɾ suɫuˈsɐ̃w

translations.text: That doesn’t seem like the best solution.

phrases.pt: Isso faz-me reconsiderar a ideia.
phrases.ru: Это заставляет меня пересмотреть идею.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu faʃmɨ ʁɨkõsidɨˈɾaɾ ɐ iˈdɛjɐ

translations.text: That makes me reconsider the idea.

phrases.pt: Preciso de mais informação para decidir.
phrases.ru: Мне нужно больше информации, чтобы решить.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ ˈmajʃ ĩfuɾmɐˈsɐ̃w ˈpaɾɐ dɨsiˈdiɾ

translations.text: I need more information to decide.

phrases.pt: Não vejo isso como um problema sério.
phrases.ru: Я не вижу в этом серьёзной проблемы.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈveʒu ˈisu ˈkomu ˈũ pɾuˈblɛmɐ ˈsɛɾju

translations.text: I don’t see this as a serious problem.

phrases.pt: Isso não era bem o que eu queria dizer.
phrases.ru: Это не совсем то, что я хотел(а) сказать.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu nɐ̃w ˈɛɾɐ bẽ u kɨ ew kɨˈɾiɐ dɨˈzeɾ

translations.text: That’s not exactly what I meant to say.

phrases.pt: Tenho sentimentos mistos em relação a isso.
phrases.ru: У меня смешанные чувства по этому поводу.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu sɨtĩˈmẽtuʃ ˈmiʃtuʃ ẽ ʁɨlɐˈsɐ̃w ɐ ˈisu

translations.text: I have mixed feelings about this.

phrases.pt: Não estou totalmente convencido disso.
phrases.ru: Я не до конца в этом убеждён(на).
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ʃˈtow totɐɫˈmẽtɨ kõvẽˈsidu ˈdisu

translations.text: I’m not fully convinced about this.

phrases.pt: Isso merece ser pensado com mais atenção.
phrases.ru: Это стоит обдумать более внимательно.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu mɨˈɾesɨ seɾ pẽˈsadu kõ ˈmajʃ ɐtẽˈsɐ̃w

translations.text: This deserves more careful thought.

phrases.pt: Não é assim tão claro para mim.
phrases.ru: Для меня это не так уж ясно.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ɛ ɐˈsĩ tɐ̃w ˈklaɾu ˈpaɾɐ mĩ

translations.text: It’s not that clear to me.

phrases.pt: Isso não me deixa totalmente tranquilo.
phrases.ru: Это не даёт мне полного спокойствия.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu nɐ̃w mɨ ˈdejʃɐ totɐɫˈmẽtɨ tɾɐ̃ˈkiɫu

translations.text: That doesn’t make me feel completely at ease.

phrases.pt: Tenho uma opinião um pouco diferente.
phrases.ru: У меня немного другое мнение.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu ˈumɐ opiniˈɐ̃w ˈũ ˈpoku difɨˈɾẽtɨ

translations.text: I have a slightly different opinion.

phrases.pt: Isso não estava nos meus planos.
phrases.ru: Это не входило в мои планы.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu nɐ̃w ɨʃˈtaβɐ nuʃ ˈmejʃ ˈplɐnuʃ

translations.text: That wasn’t in my plans.

phrases.pt: Não é algo que eu decidiria agora.
phrases.ru: Это не то, что я бы решил(а) сейчас.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ɛ ˈaɫɡu kɨ ew dɨsidiˈɾiɐ ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: It’s not something I would decide right now.

phrases.pt: Isso pode ter várias interpretações.
phrases.ru: Это можно интерпретировать по-разному.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ˈpɔdɨ teɾ ˈvaɾjɐʃ ĩtɨɾpɾɨtɐˈsɐ̃jʃ

translations.text: This can have several interpretations.

phrases.pt: Não tenho a mesma opinião sobre isso.
phrases.ru: У меня другое мнение по этому поводу.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu ɐ ˈmeʒmɐ opiniˈɐ̃w ˈsoβɾɨ ˈisu

translations.text: I don’t share the same opinion about this.

phrases.pt: Isso faz-me pensar duas vezes.
phrases.ru: Это заставляет меня подумать дважды.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu faʃmɨ pẽˈsaɾ ˈduɐʃ ˈvezɨʃ

translations.text: That makes me think twice.

phrases.pt: Não estou totalmente de acordo com isso.
phrases.ru: Я не полностью с этим согласен(на).
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ʃˈtow totɐɫˈmẽtɨ dɨ ɐˈkɔɾdu kõ ˈisu

translations.text: I don’t completely agree with that.

phrases.pt: Isso não é tão simples quanto parece.
phrases.ru: Это не так просто, как кажется.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu nɐ̃w ɛ tɐ̃w ˈsĩplɨʃ ˈkwɐ̃tu pɐˈɾesɨ

translations.text: It’s not as simple as it seems.

phrases.pt: Preciso de refletir um pouco mais.
phrases.ru: Мне нужно ещё немного подумать.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ ʁɨflɨˈtiɾ ˈũ ˈpoku ˈmajʃ

translations.text: I need to reflect a bit more.
